target.name: help
target.echo:
NAME ${ant.project.name}
SYNOPSIS ant COMMAND [-D<argument>=<value>]...
DESCRIPTION Use this script to package the Plugin source code into a Java archive file to be included in your PhoneGap project.
COMMANDS help .............. Show this help menu. ant, ant help
build ............. Packages plugin source into Java archive file. ant build
clean ............. Remove existing archive file. ant clean
